SUB_W17_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W17_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This is Brighthome. You have been summoned
here by its king, so make sure to go along with
things as appropriate. Oh, and maybe practice
your curtsey and all that, mmm?

SUB_W17_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Ye may be fine with just 'going along,'
love, but I cannae promise to do that.

SUB_W17_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W17_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You make me sound like some sort of
boot-licking glad-hander! You really should
treat your commander with more respect.

SUB_W17_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
This land's king should be in that castle.
I'll go offer my greetings.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Be welcome in Brighthome, my new warrior!
I am Din, the king of this land, and full glad
am I that you have answered my call.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
So you're the one who
called me here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Just so. I have summoned you hence so you
might join the battle against the forces
of Chaos spreading o'er this land.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
We are set against them in battle without end,
and require aid from warriors across the
Conjoined Worlds that we might continue
our brave endeavor.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text: Then your war is not going well?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Our brave allies continue their valorous fight
across the land—and while we have seen many
victories, so too have we known much of defeat.
Alas, Chaos is not a foe easily laid low.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I would have you join us as we attempt to
drive our foes back unto the Cleft of Chaos,
located to the far north of this castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Do ye truly believe I can make
a difference in this struggle?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Be this false vanity, or do you truly not
comprehend your own worth as a warrior?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
The nearby village and fields were set upon
by the forces of Chaos, and the battle to
see them safe is now underway. And while I know it unseemly to ask this so
soon after your arrival in our world, I would
have you lend us your aid, that we might
drive our hated foe into obscurity.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Participating in this war may lead to
finding my heart—so in a way, ye are
attempting to guide me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
There are warriors from across the Conjoined
Worlds here in Brighthome, and their reasons
for fighting—as well as the nature of their
hearts—are as varied as their homeworlds. Yet through the war with Chaos will those
hearts shine all the brighter! So yes,
my warrior: bearing witness to this may
indeed lead to the answers you seek.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Then I will join your battle
against the power of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Then I hereby decree you to be our
newest warrior, and grant you the
proud appellation of Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Aye, but I'm D05-72314, commonly known as
Songstress Diva No. 5. I don't require a new name.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
All who find their way to Brighthome
are granted a name by the king, Seer.
This is the way of things.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
I will add the appellation of
'Seer' to my database, then.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, you must be King Din's newest warrior.
I'm President, and I lead the warrior band
in this village and the surrounding area.
It's good to meet you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
This war is unfolding across all Brighthome—
and when things are going poorly for us on the
other side of the bridges, the forces of Chaos are
able to harry us as they like on this side.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
That said, they're nowhere near as strong here
as they are at the positions closest to the
Cleft of Chaos, which is why a man like me
can still be of some use. My field is governance, you see.
Not war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Ye were summoned here by
King Din as well, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Indeed. From what I understand, the people
of this world can't hold their own in the war
against the forces of Chaos, so they call on
the power of fighters from other worlds.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, I'm searching for my heart.
Might ye know anything about that?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
As I said, with battle unfolding all across
Brighthome, we've not the luxury of worrying
about anything but war. That's likely why 
King Din is expecting so much of you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Truly? But I've only just
arrived in this world.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
You have the power to see unobstructed.
To see much. To forecast. To watch. 
That's why you were given your name.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Perhaps you refer to my scanning functionality?
Because otherwise, I'm a machine that doesn't
possess any special powers of note.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Fair enough. Now then, while you'll often
find yourself facing many choices, you can
only aid one particular area at a time. And while the war will get worse in locations
where you don't help, you can't do anything
about that. You're just one soldier, after all,
so try to keep that in mind.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Understood. I'll have to consider my
course carefully while also bearing in
mind the war situation. So to start,
I suppose I should pop by the fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
You must be Seer, our new warrior.
I'm President, and I lead the fighters in this village
and the surrounding area. Thanks for the help.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text: Honestly, I was a little disappointed when you went there—but it wasn't wrong, per se. When it comes to where you go, all you can do is make whatever choice you think is best.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
But as you get deeper into the war and head over
the bridges, you need to have a plan in place—
because any locations on this side that you leave
on their own will be targeted by the enemy. And look, I know our ultimate goal is to
strike at the Cleft of Chaos, but if all
we think about is advancing the line...

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Then positions on this side of the
bridge could easily fall to Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Yep. Slow and steady progress is the best
course—or at least that's what I think.
Everyone else seems to just want big
flashy results, though, so who knows.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Now, c'mon. Let's work together
and liberate Brighthome from the
clutches of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you must be King Din's new warrior!
I'm Manikin—I lead the warrior band that
protects these fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
The war's unfolding all across Brighthome, and
when things are going bad on the other side of
the bridges, the forces of Chaos show up here.
Hell, sometimes they even come to these fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
That said, the enemy's pretty weak here
compared to their strength near the
Cleft of Chaos, which is how a fellow
like me can still be useful. So if you need someone to watch over
a field, I'm your guy.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ye were summoned here
by King Din as well?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sure was! No idea why the king needed a wooden
thing like me to help out, but here I am—and I want
to do the best job I can to aid the people and fields
of this world.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, I'm searching for my heart.
Might ye know anything about that?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ha ha ha! Buddy, my head's made of wood,
so there's no way I'd know about that kind
of thing. All I know is that King Din seems
to be expecting a lot from you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Truly? But I've only just
arrived in this world.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, but he named you the Seer, right?
That means you've got the power to see
things unobstructed—to predict the future,
watch what unfolds, and understand it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
But no matter how much you can see, you can still
only help one place at a time—so the others will
just have to figure out some other way to get by. I know that sounds rough, but trust me,
you'll get used to it. Just remember that
you're not fighting alone, so get out
there and do the best you can, okay?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Understood. I'll have to consider my
course carefully while also bearing in
mind the war situation. So to start,
I suppose I should pop by the village.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you must be King Din's new warrior!
I'm Manikin—I lead the warrior band that
protects these fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, it wasn't great watching you head
to the village before us, but I figured
you'd make it out this way eventually.
And now look! Here you are.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Just remember that the closer you get to
the Cleft of Chaos in the hinterlands,
the harder it will be for you to come
back here and help out. Basically, while you're off helping at one
location, positions elsewhere might fall to
the forces of Chaos. It's a huge bummer,
but them's the breaks.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
So a constant understanding of the
complete situation is the first step
toward victory, then.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yep. As for me, my job is to keep
an eye on things—and thankfully,
I am GREAT at standing completely
motionless and staring at stuff!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Now get out there and let's give this
fight all we've got—for Brighthome's
people AND its fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So you're the newcomer, eh, Seer? Tongues around
here are all a'wag about how you're the greatest
thing since milled bread, which is why the king
is expecting all these great things from you. Me though? I don't trust that kind of talk—
and folks like you who encourage it really
chap my cheeks. So I think it's time to knock
you around and show you what's what.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
A traditional Brighthome welcome, is it?
How lovely! I'm chuffed at the chance to
experience such a thing!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Heh. You ain't half bad, Seer.
The name's Bully—or at least that's
what people around here call me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah, that's what I thought:
all talk, no fists. Well, I'm Bully—leader of the warrior band
in these parts. Pretty short name, but you
seem a bit dense, so write it down somewhere
if it helps you remember.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This place is a mine, aye? Is the ore
unearthed here used for weapons, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I only just got here myself, so I don't
know a whole lot more than you.
Basically, stuff that's dug up here gets
sent to King Din's castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Oh, so it's the king's mine?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Let's use it to help nearby areas.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Let's send more to the king.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Heh. I like the way you think, Seer—
sending all this junk off to the king
always struck me as a hell of a waste.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Though King Din may be steamed,
we have a war to win.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
We couldn't fight the forces of Chaos if we
were afraid of what the damn king might do!
Look, I'll just sock him one if he complains,
so don't worry that pretty face about it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
So the king's boots ain't been tonguewashed
enough for your liking, eh? Sure thing, Seer.
I hear ya loud and clear.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
You must be the new war asset I keep hearing
about. I take it you're traveling the world like
a one-woman commando unit? Ah, but that
makes me jealous... Anyway, I'm Warden, and it's my job
to watch over the graveyard.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
I'd not think there was anything worth
stealing in a cemetery, love.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Not unless you count the dead that are pulling
themselves out of the dirt and roaming the land!
Hell, that's the dictionary definition of Chaos,
ain't it, pal? That's why the enemy's always got
their beady little eyes fixed on
the corpses here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
On top of that, we've got bodies piling up like
cordwood, and not enough hands to see 'em
properly buried. We're pretty much cleaning
up after the other warrior bands' messes.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Also, King Din might've named me Warden,
but I don't see why I've gotta resign myself
to watching over some moldering old graves. I should be out there saving grand castles,
sacred temples, and ancient ruins. I mean,
hell, any idiot can keep an eye on a grave,
but I was meant for greater things!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Is there anything I
can do to help ye?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
You're good...uh, people, for offering.
Maybe just tend the graves or somethin'?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey! You there! I KNOW you're not here
to steal my prey, right? Riiight!? Hmm... Now that I look more closely,
I don't think I've seen your face before.
Which warrior band are you with?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, right. The new 'reinforcements.'
I heard a warrior with the power to
turn the tide of the war was coming—
though can't say I'm seeing it in you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text: I've no power such as that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Still, so long as I get to keep fighting my heart
out, I don't really care what you do or how the
war effort's going overall. I chew up fiends and
spit 'em out, and that's what makes sense to me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
So ye fight because your heart
tells ye to do so, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I'm just a fighter invited here by King Din.
If you wanna know all the whys and hows,
you'll have to ask the big man himself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Now, are you gonna stand here griping
at me all day, or are you gonna get out
there and scope some more positions?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Aye, I'll be off.
Terribly sorry for the bother.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Was this town abandoned due to
the invasion of Chaos, perhaps?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Some people yet live here,
and we fight to protect them. I am Floral. You are Seer, the one
people are talking about, yes?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
People talk about me? Oh my days!
What are they saying?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Good and bad in equal measure—the good
being that you might be the one who can
bring an end to this wretched war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I will not speak of it, for I place no
stock in rumor. Rather, I would like to
ascertain the truth of you for myself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Test your mettle against the forces of
Chaos here in town so I might determine
the truth of you. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am Gunner. You are Seer, yes?
We have succeeded in retaking
the stronghold, and I thank you
for your assistance.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
With this fortress claimed, our forces could
set out for the Cleft of Chaos from the shortest
possible distance—which is a cracking strategy
for turning the war to our favor!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Indeed. This fortress was built to deal with
the mighty fiends that emerge from the Cleft,
but it had fallen into enemy hands long ago.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Should we set out for
the Cleft, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
No, the time is not yet right. We will better
our chances at successfully cutting off the
Cleft if we take all the positions around it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aye, I concur with that assessment.
Let's set our sights on a sure victory!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
We're near the Cleft of Chaos, and yet there
are no fiends here. The person who protects
this temple must be a proper fighter indeed!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Correct! I am Sorceress,
the fighter to whom you refer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I was surprised to see another warrior
band here, but then I realized you must
be the newcomer, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, what fine timing! The forces of Chaos
have come, drawn as they are to your power.
Now you can show me just what King Din's
secret weapon is made of!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
You clearly know how to fight, Seer. Perhaps
you truly are the one who will bring an end
to the war with Chaos—not that the prospect
thrills me, if I'm being honest.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Welcome to Hell, Seer. You find that
heart you're looking for yet?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Has Chaos reduced this
place to a ruin, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This place was a ruin well before the
Cleft of Chaos even opened. This is
why it attracts the forces of Chaos,
and why it has become Hell itself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This location does not match any existing
Hells noted in my database, but the idea
of a keeper of Hell is one I have many
preexisting entries for.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You're calling me the keeper of Hell,
you heartless machine?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aye, I am. Were ye summoned
here by King Din as well?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Sure was! I'm Gadget. I have a true name,
but right now, I just use the name given
to me by the man I work for, King Din.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
King Din says warriors' hearts shine bright
by fighting with Chaos, and that I might
find a clue regarding my own heart if
I were to witness such things.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You wanna see my heart shine? Then stand back
and watch me send everything that emerges from
the Cleft of Chaos to Hell! Bwaaa ha ha ha!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And with that, it appears we have enemies
closing in. I'll be certain to share a couple
with you, Seer!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I've been to the temple and the ruins—
and as the king said, there certainly
are loads of different warriors there!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Those warriors are interested in nothing save
demonstrating their own strength—they could
not care less about the war or cooperating
with our other positions across the land. That said, they are also the only reason
you and I are able to continue fighting
so close to the Cleft.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I suspect ye could get them to cooperate
with ye here at the stronghold now.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I wager this is true—and hope so
as well. For now is our chance
to march on the Cleft of Chaos!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So you have arrived at last.
Well done, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.text: We've yet to secure the ruins.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Be that as it may, we cannot let
slip this opportunity to strike
at the Cleft of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_010_CUT_000_010.text: We've yet to secure the temple.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I would bear witness to the
final battle for myself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_000_010.text:
The legendary treasure is
filled with heaps of power!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Do not let up! Strike at them
and seal the Cleft!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
And with that, the Cleft is sealed.
For a time, at least, peace will
reign across the land.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Can the Cleft not be
sealed off entirely?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
We have attempted many approaches—such
as blockading it with soil or water—but ever
does the maw of Chaos yawn wide. All we can do is enjoy a moment's peace
until the time comes when we must
summon warriors once more.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_030.text: And are ye satisfied with that?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_040.text:
The Cleft's appearance leads to the arrival
of warriors across the worlds, and we are
able to meet their kind only when it is open.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_050.text:
I would not end that for all the world,
for having met with you is one of the
supreme delights of my life!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_060.text:
The warriors I encountered in the war each
had their own hearts—hearts as varied as
the worlds they came from. But where am
I going to find my own heart?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_010.text: So this isn't the end, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_020.text:
The Cleft of Chaos will open again erelong,
at which point our battle will flare anew.
Warriors will then arrive in Brighthome once
more, for such is the way of things here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_030.text:
I don't think an eternal war would be
possible even for a machine like me.
Do ye really keep fighting forever?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We do, Seer. Brighthome is a world locked
in eternal conflict—but this only makes our
fleeting moments of peace all the sweeter.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_050.text:
I thank you one and all,
my brave warrior bands!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Sadly, there are many worlds that engage
in the futility of such endless conflicts...
Ah, well! Time for us to be off.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_070.text:
I am chuffed I was able to be of at
least some small aid to Brighthome.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_000.text:
And thus is the Cleft blocked off.
Your strength was formidable, Seer—
rather too formidable, in fact.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_020.text:
I so enjoy watching our warriors do battle that
I often find myself wishing the war might go on
forever. Thus did I call you here to shore up
the fighting strength of our bands, but now...

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_030.text: Wait. Ye think this victory was a mistake? Ye think all the warriors here fighting with all they had was a mistake!?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_040.text:
I have no further use for you, Seer.
Begone from my sight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_041.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_041.text:
Ha ha ha! Oh, that King Din is a card,
all right–a wild card! I do so love
people like that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_050.text:
I dinnae even know why I came to this world now,
and can no longer properly evaluate the results
of all this in order to find my answer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_010.text:
So the Cleft cannae be closed even
with the legendary weapon in play?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_020.text:
Correct. The Cleft of Chaos will open again erelong,
at which point our battle will flare anew. New warriors
will then arrive in Brighthome, making this but a single
page in our great history.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_030.text:
And the legendary treasure?
What of that?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_040.text: A legend must ever remain a legend.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_041.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_041.text:
Well, I suppose this means we of the
National Extradimensional Exploratory
Task Force have become yet another page
in that particular legend.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_050.text:
Thinking of it in that way makes me
a wee bit happy. So ta, Brighthome!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
We're close to the Cleft of Chaos, yet there
are no fiends here. The fighter who protects
this temple must be proper capable.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Correct! I am Sorceress,
the fighter to whom you refer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I was surprised to see another warrior
band here, but then I realized you must
be the newcomer, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, what fine timing! The forces of Chaos
have come, drawn as they are to your power.
Now you can show me just what King Din's
secret weapon is made of!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Perhaps you truly are the one who will bring
an end to the battle with Chaos. I pray this
might be so, for I have grown weary of war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Why have you come to Hell?
Is finding your heart truly so important?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Since I don't know where my heart is,
I've no choice but to go everywhere
in search of it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
A machine in search of a heart, eh?
Hard to imagine I'd run into someone
like you anywhere but a hell like this!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ye were summoned here by
King Din as well, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Sure was! I'm Gadget. I have a true name,
but right now, I just use the name given
to me by the man I work for, King Din.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Beg pardon, but can ye maybe
help to find my heart, Gadget?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
As though 'help' could even exist in Hell.
If you cling to the thread of salvation,
sooner or later it will snap and send you
plummeting into the abyss.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
And with that, the enemies close in.
Let us see how you fare, Seer!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
If you've come for a grave, you can dig your own.
I don't have enough hands to be digging one for
everybody who keels over right now.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
I do not require a grave.
Were those fiends grave robbers?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
They sure as hell were! The dastards come
here, dig up corpses, and turn 'em into
servants of Chaos. And if they manage to take the graveyard,
we'll be up to our armpits in enemies
trying to send us into our own graves.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ye must be an incredible warrior
to have been tasked with protecting
such an important position.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I'm incredible—ask any of the other
warriors around here, and they'll all tell
ya no one holds a candle to Warden!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, but you're just grand!
And with that, farewell.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Don't leave! I've got more to say!
...Bah. She's gone.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This fortress was built by the followers
of Chaos, then? I'm surprised they have
such technical capabilities.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_000_CUT_000_010.text:
They did not build this stronghold—
they stole it from us. This is why
it's proven so difficult to reclaim.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
So if we did retake it, it would
prove advantageous?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FORT_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That is correct. Also, I am Gunner,
the leader of the warrior band here.
Thank you for your aid, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Was this town perhaps abandoned
due to the invasion of Chaos?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It was—and soon, every place in this
world will suffer the same fate.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_020.text: So we're going to lose, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_030.text:
If the warrior bands were truly so powerful,
this war would not have dragged on so long.
Alas, the reality of the war with Chaos is
not so kind as all that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Aye, that's what I thought.
This is not a problem I can
solve on my lonesome, I fear.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Don't be so sure about that!
You're the Seer, after all.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_060.text: Nae, I'm just an ordinary machine.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CITY_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I am Floral, and the land tells me all.
The forces of Chaos will be upon us soon.
I pray you might fight them off, Seer!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, joy. King Din's little plaything
is back. Not looking all that reliable
this time, are you, plaything?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Some machines are sold as toys,
but I'm not one such unit.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Shut the hell up! If that's the case,
I'll MAKE you into a plaything!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_MINE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That exceeded my anticipated combat
strength. I'll have to revise my data.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks a ton for your help out here
in the fields. I mean, not that we're
growing anything, but still.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Why are ye here as a guard
if there are no crops?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_020.text:
'Cause I'm Manikin, a glorified scarecrow
who can't do anything BUT protect fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_030.text:
But ye must have an important duty
if King Din summoned ye here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_040.text:
No idea. Glorified scarecrow, remember?
But there WAS something I realized this
one time when I was staring motionlessly
at the fields...

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_060.text: There are no crows in Brighthome!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, that's true! I hadn't realized!
Gosh, but ye're brilliant, love.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, I'm so glad you're here, Seer!
I've been waiting for you to come
for SO LONG!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, I'd be dead chuffed to help,
but I'm not sure how to do that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You can take me the hell out of here,
because I absolutely cannot STAND
being here one second longer! C'mon, you can do that, right? Please!
I'll do anything! I'm begging you!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Please calm down, love. If ye leave this
place, it will be attacked by the forces
of Chaos and we'll lose the position.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I chew up fiends and spit 'em back out!
Then I do it again! And again! And AGAIN!
I can't take it anymore! I CAAAAAAN'T!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_050.text:
King Din summoned ye here, and there's
nothing I can do about that. So sorry.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_060.text: No! Don't go! Don't leave me here!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_00.text:
If the forces of Chaos are showing up this
close to the castle, this war might finally
be close to ending...in our defeat. Oh. Hello there. I'm President.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_01.text:
The battle is not yet decided, though.
I'm Seer—let's fight Chaos together.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_02.text:
So you're Seer. Well, considering you only
just arrived, I see why you would trust
in King Din's power. But for the rest of us, it doesn't mean
squat. That guy doesn't do a damn thing;
whatever we accomplish, we do on our own.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_03.text:
I know the warrior bands are doing their best,
but there's been no indication that the forces
of Chaos are weakening—so if you think I'm
losing heart, that's why.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Aye, and I don't even have a heart to lose.
I apologize if I said something out of turn,
love, but I cannae stop fighting if I want
to find my own heart.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Well, you certainly seem confident,
so...I guess I'll trust you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Blargh! It's just as I feared! 
The rebels have appeared!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_010.text: So this went as you predicted, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_020.text:
My name's Immunity, and it's my job to
keep the warriors King Din summoned from
betraying him and joining up with Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_030.text:
But if the rebels have appeared,
doesn't that mean ye failed?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Not my fault! I mean, King Din may have
named me Immunity, but I can't immunize
people from wanting to REBEL! Heck,
all I really do is carry oxygen...

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Then we'd best stamp out these
rebels before their numbers grow!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_010_CUT_000_030.text:
But they turned traitor and managed
to press the attack this far. I take that
to mean ye failed, love?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_REBEL_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Then we must do something about
the rebels straight away!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Where in the hells be that legendary treasure,
by gar!? I searched this blasted castle from
stem to stern, and I ain't been findin' the
gods-damned thing anywhere!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Ye were summoned here by
King Din as well, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yar, lass! Announce yerself before ye appear
and start yer yammerin'! Ye made me jump
outta me skin, so ye did! Gar, but I be Pirate. Who be ye?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Gahar har har! King Din's
little trump card! Sorry to break it to ye, lass, but there
already be a treasure hidden here in Brighthome
that can turn the tide of the war without ye—
and I was called here to be sniffin' it out!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Oh, but I'd love to see a treasure
like that for myself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Gwuh!? Er, I mean, no! No, this whole
castle is bare as bleached bones.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_070.text:
My sensors haven't detected a treasure like
the one ye describe, but I suppose it wouldn't
be a legend if it could be so easily found.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Gar, curse me bones!
It ain't here, neither!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
They say it's hardest to find
what's right under one's nose.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Manikin is going to be proper upset
if this woman digs up the fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
It would have been found by the
miners already if it were here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text: Poor form to rob graves, love.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
My sensors aren't picking
up any readings here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
My sensors aren't picking
up any readings here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
That doesn't appear to be any
kind of divine relic, though.

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Gahar har har! I've found it!
The legendary treasure!

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Brilliant! Now use it to turn
the tide of the war!

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Gar, ye be followin' me,
ye detestable contrivance! And aye, I'll turn the tide—but I'll
be keepin' the treasure afterwards!

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aye, that's only fair; ye be the
one who found it, after all.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You pitched in to fight too, Guv?
Much appreciated.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Heya, Guv! You helped with the
fighting? Thanks for that!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Been a minute and a half, eh, Guv?
You and I gotta scrap next time!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You were out there fighting, Guv?
My apologies—I did not realize.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Ha ha ha! Been a long time, Guv!
Let's spar again sometime.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Why, if it isn't Guv!
I thank you for joining the fight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Your presence here explains
our victory, Guv. Thank you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, well. If it isn't Guv.
Surprised you're still out there
fighting and not retired already.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You're looking pretty tired there, Guv.
Ready for your trip to Hell so soon?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.text:
You're Seer, yes? Ah, it's no wonder I felt
that dazzling radiance; with a warrior like
you here, I can finally retire in peace.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from town. I pray your fight
goes well, m'lady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the fields.
I pray your fight goes well, m'lady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the mine.
I pray your fight goes well, m'lady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the cemetery.
I pray your fight goes well, m'lady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the church. I pray your
fight goes well, m'lady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from town. I pray your fight
goes well, m'lady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the stronghold. I pray
your fight goes well, m'lady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the temple. I pray your
fight goes well, m'lady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the ruins. I pray your
fight goes well, m'lady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_04.text: Life certainly is a rich tapestry.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_00.text:
I see no sign of Guv or his wife.
I wonder what became of them.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_01.text: I hope to meet them again someday.

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_000.text: Ah! You must be the newcomer.

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_010.text: Aye, I'm Seer. Ye know much.

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Warriors of all stripes are called to this
place. But no matter who or what they are,
every newcomer has a certain youthful vitality
to them—a vitality I sense now in you.

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, such vitality is something a wizened old man
like me has lost. I'm a warrior as well, you see—
though a worn and battered one. Guv is the name
given to me by the king, and all I'll answer to.

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I've only just come to this world, so the
things I don't understand far outnumber
the ones I do. Please teach me, love!

SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_DIVA_HELP_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Ha! You've quite the silver tongue,
newcomer! Just make certain you
fight as well as you flatter.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_000.text:
With the battle ended, we no longer need
to use the names given to us by the king.
I am called Simon.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I am D05-72314, commonly known
as Songstress Diva No. 5.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Did you get your hands on the
heart you were looking for?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I don't know. Did ye come here
for something yourself, Simon?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The members of my squadron all perished
in battle—and when I failed to fulfill
my objective, I joined them in death. The next thing I knew, I was waking
here in Brighthome with a new name.
So no. No big impressive goals for me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Oh my days, does that mean I'm ALSO dead!?
Was I destroyed somewhere along the way!?
I've no data to indicate as much, but...
I'll need to retrace my steps and find out!

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Is my following you
out of the question?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_070.text:
There's a high probability that your life
systems only function within Brighthome.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I have no intention of fighting here for the
rest of eternity. If I leave this place and
vanish, that's just what was meant to be.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Then let's go search
for my heart together.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So you're our new warrior, yes?
Everything is in order for you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You are to be my combat instructor,
then? Thank you for having me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
My name is Guv, and I must admit I don't
consider myself to be much of an instructor.
In any case, let's begin, shall we?
Time is of the essence here in Brighthome.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_030.text: All right. Thank you very much.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Do you have some kind of power
to summon fiends, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Ah, no, we just have a great many
of them lurking all about the place.
There's always a fight to be had
here in Brighthome.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Heavens. This world seems like a much
darker place than its name would suggest.

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_001_CUT_000_000.text:
Time for your next bit of training.
Are you ready?

SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_002_CUT_000_000.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_002_CUT_000_000.text:
This is your last trial.
Are you ready?
